flawed_nl_solution:
The original flock gains 30-20=<<30-20=40>>40 ducks per year
So after 5 years they have gained 40*5=<<40*5=200>>200 ducks
So the original flock has 100+200=<<100+200=300>>300 ducks
So the combined flock has 300+150=<<300+150=450>>450 ducks

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 40. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
